item.infoText: The Inverted Jenny (1918) was accidentally printed with the plane upside down.
The Bluenose (1929) is considered to be the most beautiful stamp in the world.
The first human spaceflight project in USA.
Robert H. Goddard launched his first rocket in March 1926.
This beauty, from 1898, marks British possessions in a cheerful red hue.
The Columbus stamps were the first commemorative stamps issued by the USA.
The Viking Ship was issued in 1925 and features excellent engraving detail.
